name: A Very Normal Game About A Bee
name_original: A Very Normal Game About A Bee
description:
Transparent Window using Pygame? This Desktop-Pet game is about a bee which you need to catch by clicking on it. The bee tries to fly away when it comes in contact with your mouse pointer. Click it 3 times to win the game!

This executable can be flagged by antiviruses, even though it is not a virus. If there are any doubts regarding the genuineness of the game, then the source for the game can be found here, and you can run it via the source.
